title: What are examples of modern technology? - Quora

response.answer_text: The Technology is updating day to day. The advancements are in all most all industries they include automobile, Communication sector, Agriculture … etc even our search engines are updating day to day. I will list out some of them, The Google had made huge modifications in all its features. I will tell here about the most used applications Google photos, Maps and Gmail. Google photos, it is the era for AI(Artificial Intelligence) now a days every phone camera having this feature and even they many apps to make photo stylish …etc. We can Stop doing that and simple we can use google photos as a photo editor and eventually there is an expected possibility of recognising faces and sharing it to them. Then about Maps, we are going to see different view in maps as there will be store fronts seen and even the clear picture of where to go with landmarks in detail. Gmail also updated I gives suggestions based on person and letter we type we can look it as autocomplete option.

Some of the examples that I think are examples of modern technology are:- Self Driving Cars- It is currently in development by various companies and some have already tested it like Google, Tesla.IOT(Internet of Things)-Another great modern technology. IBM is close to completing it and it will be launched by 2020 expectedly.Selifie StickHandheld consoles i.e. Nintendo SwitchSmartwatchesThese can be some examples which I think is an example of modern technology. There are many more examples of modern technologies and these are just some of them.
